pages.text: $(li)The Grass is a placeable block that grows naturally in grassy biomes like $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroos$(/l).
$(li)It can only be obtained breaking Grass while you are holding a pair of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand.
